Class BlogMapper

java.lang.Object
com.cb.backend.mapper.BlogMapper
public class BlogMapper extends Object
Mapper class for converting between Blog entities and BlogDto data transfer objects.

Provides methods to convert a Blog entity to a BlogDto and to update an existing Blog entity with data from a BlogDto.

    • toDto

      public static BlogDto toDto(Blog blog)
      Converts a Blog entity to a BlogDto.
      Parameters:
      blog - the Blog entity to convert
      Returns:
      a BlogDto containing data from the Blog entity

    • updateEntity

      public static void updateEntity(Blog blog, BlogDto dto, User user)
      Updates an existing Blog entity with data from a BlogDto.
      Parameters:
      blog - the Blog entity to update
      dto - the BlogDto containing new values
      user - the User entity to set as the author of the blog
